head.title: Merge {{EXT}} Files in {{ProgLang}} | {{EXT}} Merger
head.description: Merge multiple {{EXT}} files into a single file using {{ProgLang}} {{ProductName}} documents merger API. Merge specific pages or page ranges from various documents to a single document.

header.title: {{EXT}} Merger In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Merge {{EXT}} with a few lines of {{ProductName}} code.

about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.h1: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/merger/{{ProductCode}}/) offers a simple solution to safely join & split between a wide range of document formats including PDF, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote), OpenDocument, HTML, images and many others within .NET applications. By adding just a few lines of the code, perform several document operations such as move, remove, rotate, swap, extract or change the orientation of pages within the documents. The documents merging API also supports previewing document pages as an image to analyse the document structure, formatting and content on the page.
about.h2: GroupDocs.Merger APIs are well supported on all major operating systems and platforms including {{Runtime}}.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/merger/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProductName}} developers to merge two or more {{EXT}} files within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Create new instance of **Merger** and pass source document path as a constructor parameter.
content_left.step_2: Call **Join** of **Merger** class and pass the second source document path.
content_left.step_3: Call **Save** of **Merger** class to save the merged document.

content_right.description: {{ProductFullName}} APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_right.step_4: Download the latest version of {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

demos.h1: Merge more than one {{EXT}} files right now by visiting [GroupDocs.Merger Live Demos](https://products.groupdocs.app/merger/{{ext}}) website.
demos.h2: The live demo has the following benefits.

more_formats.title: Merging Other Document Formats
more_formats.content: {{ProductName}} documents merger API for file formats and images. Merge together some of the popular document formats as stated below.
